# UIAlertAction.Style.cancel

**Case**

Apply a style that indicates the action cancels the operation and leaves things unchanged.

## Declaration

```swift
case cancel
```

## Constants

- **UIAlertAction.Style.default**: Apply the default style to the action’s button.
- **UIAlertAction.Style.destructive**: Apply a style that indicates the action might change or delete data.

items.description: Apply the default style to the action’s button.
